scripts.backend: npm run backend-package && npm run backend-deploy
scripts.backend-package: cd src/backend/transcriber/ && zip -r ../../../backend/transcriber.zip Dockerfile pom.xml src/
scripts.backend-deploy: aws s3 cp src/backend/transcriber/backend.zip s3://media-analysis-demo/build/ --acl public-read
scripts.build: npm run webui-build && npm run lambda-build && npm run cfn-build && npm run backend-package && npm run webui-package
scripts.cfn-build: npm run cfn-dist && cfn-flip -c -n -l src/cfn/template.yaml templates/template.yaml && npm run cfn-lambdas-dist && npm run cfn-copy-lambdas
scripts.cfn-copy-lambdas: npm run cfn-copy-lambdas-aws_sdk && npm run cfn-copy-lambdas-fp && npm run cfn-copy-lambdas-orchestrator && npm run cfn-copy-lambdas-setup
scripts.cfn-deploy: npm run zip && aws s3 cp ./`npm run echo-version --silent`.zip s3://$CFN_BUCKET/$npm_package_name/`npm run echo-version --silent`/$npm_package_name.zip
scripts.cfn-lambdas-dist: npm run cfn-lambdas-dist-aws_sdk && npm run cfn-lambdas-dist-fp && npm run cfn-lambdas-dist-orchestrator && npm run cfn-lambdas-dist-setup
scripts.cfn-test-local: npm run lambda-build && npm run cfn-build && aws cloudformation package --template-file templates/template.yaml --output-template-file templates/packaged.yaml --s3-bucket $TEST_BUCKET && aws cloudformation deploy --template-file templates/packaged.yaml --stack-name MediaAnalysis --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.deploy: npm run webui-deploy && npm run backend-deploy && npm run cfn-deploy
scripts.lambda-build: npm run lambda-build-layers && npm run lambda-build-orchestrator && npm run lambda-build-setup
scripts.postinstall: cd src/frontend && npm i && cd ../backend/functions/setup && npm i && cd ../orchestrator && npm i
scripts.test: npm run cfn-test && npm run webui-test && npm run orch-test
scripts.webui-deploy: cd src/frontend/build && aws s3 cp . s3://media-analysis-demo/static --recursive --acl public-read --exclude settings.js --exclude .DS_Store
